ISSUE.TITLE: chore: code format optimization of `t/lib/server.lua` file
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue description In the `t/lib/server.lua` file, there is only one blank line between most `functions`, and we need two blank lines. Example： ``` function _M.XXX() XXX end function _M.YYY() YYY end ```
